mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lowry, Robert K.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: During short residence here has written work on treatment of silkworm; sends these observations with portion of seed of the silkworm; Jefferson alone could or would have curiousity to attempt introduction of this insect into U.S.; is going to Marseilles; will send any further information he obtains.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1804 October 4, Siena, [Italy] to [Thomas Jefferson], n.p.
